name: Quantum Loop - Wowie! Jam 3.0 Entry
description:
Quantum Loop is a time-defying action/puzzle game! In Quantum Loop, dying is only part of the process.

When you die, a clone of yourself appears. Use your limited time and ammo wisely on those pesky robots and shootable buttons, and escape through 6 levels!

Features
  • 6 level campaign - final boss included!
  • Unique Loop feature that creates mind bending puzzles!
  • 4-song soundtrack made by "meeow"!
This game has been made for the Wowie! Jam 3.0

Like our game? Give it a rating! Didn't like it? Give it a rating too! Or i don't know, i'm just a game description, do whatever you want.
